AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Andrew P. Graham: Border Patrol Agent with three years' experience serving in the Alpine area, testified about the driver's suspicious behavior
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jay Snodgrass: Border Patrol Agent with eleven years' experience, including a few months in the Alpine area, contributed to the reasonable suspicion determination
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Brignoni-Ponce Jacquinot: Defendant exhibiting suspicious driving behavior, such as slowing down and making unusual turns, argued against the suspicion of the truck's behavior
